Multi Signal Class Users Guide

1. Introduction

The device server signal class was created to treat the notion of signals in an object oriented device server. Signals are mainly used for tracing and logging. This class should be used in a device class which has to handle several signals.

The multi signal class offers methods which can be executed on a set of signal objects. A multi signal object is not accessible via the network. No commands are available for this class. Also the multi signal objects are stateless, no state handler is available.
